clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Use to promote weight gain after weight loss following extensive surgery

contraindications.disease: The oral LD50 of oxandrolone in mice and dogs is greater than 5 000 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Oxandrolone is an anabolic steroids indicated as adjunctive therapy to promote weight gain after weight loss following extensive surgery chronic infections or severe trauma and in some patients who without definite pathophysiologic reasons fail to gain or to maintain normal weight to offset the protein catabolism associated with prolonged administration of corticosteroids and for the relief of the bone pain frequently accompanying osteoporosis Anabolic steroids are synthetic derivatives of testosterone

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of liver damage can be increased when Oxandrolone is combined with Cyclosporine
